page.title: 16Warsop Pigeon Clubs.
page.content: There are 2 Pigeon Clubs in Warsop, one meeting midweek and the other on Saturdays.We interviewed one member. His 26 pigeons are worth about Â£20 each but he has heard of a pigeon fetching Â£27,500! He feeds his pigeons with mixed corn, 3 times a day.His heaviest bird weighs 0.72 kg. When training a pigeon it is taken a short distance from home and released to find its way back,the distance then being gradually increased. His pigeons have raced from a distance of 481 miles,their average speed being around 30 mph.They are carried to the starting point by transporter and then released.Their homing instinct brings them back to Warsop.
